#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define forall(i,a,b)               for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define pb                          push_back
#define mp 							make_pair
#define INDEX(arr,ind)               (lower_bound(all(arr),ind)-arr.begin())
#define mod                          1000000007

#define TRvi(c, it) \
for (vi::iterator it = (c).begin(); it != (c).end(); it++)
#define TRvii(c, it) \
for (vii::iterator it = (c).begin(); it != (c).end(); it++)
#define TRmsi(c, it) \
for (msi::iterator it = (c).begin(); it != (c).end(); it++)

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<int, int> ii;
typedef vector<ii> vii;
typedef set<int> si;
typedef map <string, int> msi;



int main()
{
	 #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
     //freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
     #endif
	 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);

	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,k;
		cin>>n>>k;
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		vi freq;
		int curr=s[0],len=1;
		forall(i,1,s.length()-1)
		{
			if(s[i]==curr)
			{
				len++;
			}
			else
			{
				curr=s[i];
				freq.pb(len);
				len=1;
			}
		}
		freq.pb(len);
		if(k>*max_element(freq.begin(),freq.end()))
		{
			cout<<"-1\n";
			continue;
		}
		else
		{
			
			ll ans=0;
			TRvi(freq,it)
			{
				ans+=ceil((double)(*it)/(double)k);
				
			}
			cout<<ans<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		
		



	}
	return 0;
}
